name: WKTVStormTracker2

skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill

Developer Terms of Use
des: NewsChannel 2 and Storm Tracker 2 are your leading provider of weather forecasts, severe weather info, radar maps and more in the Mohawk Valley and Central New York. Never let the weather catch you by surprise again.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
